relation.text: got into Lisbon the very next day
one Day so hot as by Mr- Fielding s
add how sensible I am of all your kind Anxieties about me and how Sincerely & Affectionately , I am , and ever shall be , Yrs . -- C. Finch Caldes July 4
proved very humane to them , the 26 th . of June
wrote me a Letter that was 8 Days
